shri lankeya jana shrathi saha janakalawangen heliwana jathika sanhindiyawaanadimath kalayaka sita shri lankawe pawathina bauddha, hindu, muslim, kristhiyani aadi wu aagamika parisarayanhi jiwath wana podu mahath shri lankeya janathawa wu kali ee ee aagamika parisarayanta aawenika yam yam wisheshathawan pradarshanaya karanne wuwa da podu mahath jana samajayak lesa gena salakime di owun thula pawathina jana shrathi, jana kala, wath piliweth saha sirith-wirith aadiye pawathinne samana bawaki.jathika sanhindiyawak pradarshanaya karanu labana puda bimak lesa salakiya haki katharagama yanu bauddha janayatath, hindu ha muslim janayatath podu wu puja bhumiyak pamanak nowa siyallo ekama aakarayakin madihath wana pujothsawayak bawata asala uthsawaya pathwa thibimen pradarshanaya wanne jathika sanhindiyawak athikara lima sandaha aagamika pasubima boho seyin iwahal wana bawayi.karthikeya, skandha, shanmugan, welan aadi nam walin hindun adahana dewiyan bauddhayinge gaurawayata pathra wi aththe katharagama dewindu, kanda surindu yana namwalin wuwa da, me siyallange gaurawayata pathra wi aththe ekama dewi keneku wana bawin bauddha ha hindu janaya kendra gatha kirimata mema dewa adahima boho seyin iwahal wi atha.
